data.title: Steeplechase Records 6000 series
data.text:
Steeplechase Records 6000 series discography

This is a discography of the 6000 series of albums released on the Steeplechase label between 1978 and 2005. The 6000 series are albums of archive material. The series has the general title "Steeplechase Records Classics".

Steeplechase pages on the site:

6000 series: 6001-6037 7000 series: 7001/2-7049/50 33100 series: 33101-33114

1000/31000 series: 1001-1099 | 1100-1199 | 1200-1299 | 1300-1399 | 1400-1499 | More to be added

At The Golden Circle, Vol. 1, Bud Powell, 1978, Steeplechase SCC 6001

Tracks : Move, Just A Gigolo, Relaxin' At Camarillo, I Remember Clifford, Reets And I, Hackensack

Musicians : Bud Powell, Torbjörn Hultcrantz, Sune Spångberg

Notes : Recorded at The Golden Circle (Gyllene Cirkeln) in Stockholm in April 1962. The CD version has one bonus track.

At The Golden Circle, Vol. 2, Bud Powell, 1978, Steeplechase SCC 6002

Tracks : Like Someone In Love, I Hear Music, Moose The Mooche, Blues In The Closet, Star Eyes

Musicians : Bud Powell, Torbjörn Hultcrantz, Sune Spångberg

Notes : Recorded at The Golden Circle (Gyllene Cirkeln) in Stockholm in April 1962. The CD version has one bonus track.

Axen, Bent Axen Trio & Quintet, 1978, Steeplechase SCC 6003

Tracks : Cosper, What's New, Message From Oscar, Born Holm, Jingle Bells, Green Dophin Street, Heart And Soul, Haig's, More Peace, The Man I Love, Laverne Walk

Musicians : Bent Axen, Allan Botschinsky, Bent Jaedig, Ole Laumann, Niels-Henning Orsted Pedersen, Finn Federikesen, Finn Frederiksen

Notes : Recordings from 1959 and 1961. The CDrelease has 8 bonus tracks.

Cry Me A River: Dexter In Radioland, Vol. 1, Dexter Gordon & Alti Bjorn Trio, 1978, Steeplechase SCC 6004

Tracks : I'll Remember April, The Thrill Is Gone, Cry Me A River, Suite

Musicians : Dexter Gordon, Atli Bjørn, Benny Nielsen, Marcel Rigot, Finn Frederiksen, William Schiöpffe

Notes : Recorded in November 1962 and May 1964.

Copenhagen Concert, Buck Clayton All Stars, 1979, Steeplechase SCC 6006/7

Tracks : Outer Drive, Swinging At The Copper Rail, Moonglow, Night Train, Swinging Along On Broadway, NYC, Exactly Like You, I Want A Little Girl, Everyday I Have The Blues, Deed I Do, Goin' To Chicago, Sent For You Yesterday

Musicians : Buck Clayton, Emmett Berry, Dicky Wells, Buddy Tate, Earle Warren, Al Williams, Gene Ramey, Herbie Lovelle, Jimmy Rushing

Notes : Recorded in Copenhagen in Sept 1959. This 1979 release was a double LP. The later CD release was on two separate CDs, Copenhagen Concert, Volume 1 and Volume 2. There were no additional tracks on the CDs.

Short Story, Kenny Dorham, 1979, Steeplechase SCC 6010

Tracks : Short Story, Bye Bye Blackbird, Manha De Carnival, The Touch Of Your Lips, My Funny Valentine

Musicians : Kenny Dorham, Allan Botschinsky, Tete Montoliu, Niels-Henning Ørsted Pedersen, Alex Riel

Notes : Recorded live in Copenhagen in December 1963.

The House I Live In, Archie Shepp / Lars Gullin Quintet, 1980, Steeplechase SCC 6013

Tracks : You Stepped Out Of A Dream, I Should Care, The House I Live In, Sweet Georgia Brown

Musicians : Archie Shepp, Lars Gullin, Tete Montoliu, Niels-Henning Ørsted Pedersen, Alex Riel

Notes : Recorded live in Copenhagen in November 1963.

At The Golden Circle, Vol. 4, Bud Powell, 1980, Steeplechase SCC 6014

Tracks : Moose The Mooche, Star Eyes, Blues In The Closet, Reets And I, John's Abbey, Old Devil Moon

Musicians : Bud Powell, Torbjörn Hultcrantz, Sune Spångberg

Notes : Recorded at The Golden Circle (Gyllene Cirkeln) in Stockholm in April 1962.

I Want More: Dexter In Radioland, Vol. 4, Dexter Gordon Quartet, 1980, Steeplechase SCC 6015

Tracks : I Want More, Come Rain Or Come Shine, Where Are You, I Want To Blow Now, Second Balcony Jump

Musicians : Dexter Gordon, Tete Montoliu, Niels-Henning Ørsted Pedersen, Rune Carlsson

Notes : Recorded live in Copenhagen in July 1964.

If I Had You, Brew Moore Quartet, 1981, Steeplechase SCC 6016

Tracks : Svinget 14, If I Had You, Zonky, It's You Or No One, Blue Monk

Musicians : Brew Moore, Atli Bjørn, Benny Nielsen, William Schiöpffe

Notes : Recorded live in Copenhagen in April 1965.

For Europeans Only, Don Redman, 1983, Steeplechase SCC 6020/21

Tracks : Metronome All Out, For Europeans Only, Don't Blame Me, All The Things You Are, Everytime I Feel The Spirit, Frantic Atlantic, How High The Moon, Laura, I Got Rhythm, Chant Of The Weeds, Dark Glasses, Oo-Ba-Ba-Le-Ba, My Melancholy Baby, Stompin' At The Savoy, The World Is Waiting For The Sunrise

Musicians : Don Redman, Alan Jeffries, Bob Williams, Peanuts Holland, Jackie Carman, Quintin Jackson, Tyree Glenn, Don Byas, Ray Abrams, Chauncey Haughton, Pete Clarke, Billy Taylor, Ted Sturgis, Buford Oliver, Inez Cavanaugh

Notes : Recorded live in Copenhagen in September 1946.

Its You Or No One: Dexter In Radioland, Vol. 6, Dexter Gordon, 1983, Steeplechase SCC 6022

Tracks : Just Friends, Three O'Clock In The Morning, Where Are You, It's You Or No One

Musicians : Dexter Gordon, Tete Montoliu, Niels-Henning Orsted Pedersen, Alex Riel

Notes : Recorded live in Copenhagen in August 1964

Copenhagen Concert, Dizzy Gillespie Quintet Quintet, 1992, Steeplechase SCCD 6024

Tracks : I Found a Million Dollar Baby, My Man, Oh! Lady Be Good, They Can't Take That Away, Wheatleigh Hall, A Short One, Introduction, A Night In Tunisia, Lorraine, Ooh-Shoo-Be-Doo-Bee, There is No Greater Love, Woody'n You

Musicians : Dizzy Gillespie, Leo Wright, Junior Mance, Art Davis, Teddy Stewart

Notes : Recorded live in Copenhagen in 1959. Appears to be no LP release of this album.
